title: Skin diseases and treatment
description:
A Skin Care guide for medical students, skin doctors and other individuals. 
All Skin Diseases and Treatment - A to Z app is your offline dermatology guide with photos! Uncover dermatological conditions, their causes, symptoms, diagnosis, skin care tips, sun safety and effective treatments.

 Learn about skin allergy, sun safety tips and the effects of sun burn. Learn about the illnesses caused by ultraviolet (UV) radiation. Guard your skin and do a skin care routine and also follow a healthy skin diet. Learn about oily skin tips and how to recover from some of the effects of sun burn.

🌟 Key Features:

👩‍⚕️ All-Inclusive Dermatology Guide: A Clinical guide.
Encyclopedia containing all skin diseases, treatments drugs, skin allergy and skin itching, created for dermatologists, medical students, and patients. A clinical medical dictionary, a medical reference book for skin doctors, students and patients. Learn about common skin problems like acne, examinations and clinical laboratory tests done for the diagnosis of various skin diseases and disorders.

🔍 Offline Accessibility:
No internet? Access the entire dermatology book offline.

💡 Early Diagnosis Matters:
Timely diagnosis is crucial for effective treatment. "All Skin Diseases and Treatment - A to Z" aids in early identification, helping prevent the progression of skin diseases and potential damage.

🌿 Holistic Skin Care Tips:
Elevate your skincare routine with home remedies and natural cures for various skin conditions such as skin allergy and skin itching. Uncover insights on face care, acne treatment, safe tattoo removal, stretch marks care, getting rid of age spots, firming a sagging skin, maintaining healthy skin and looking younger.

📸 Visual Diagnosis:
The app contains photos for each condition to enhance clarity to medical professionals, physicians, nurses, medical students, pharmacists, and physician assistants and other individuals to identify symptoms.

👶 Pediatric Dermatology:
Tailored information for pediatric skin diseases and treatments. Safeguard the skin health of the little ones with specialized insights.

📚 Educational Resource:
Explore diseases treatments clinical dictionary offline, offering comprehensive coverage of skin itching, blood diseases, skin infections, pediatric diseases, stomach diseases, and skin care tips.

🌐 Infectious Disease Information:
Some of the conditions featured include acne, alopecia areata, fungal infections of the skin, impetigo, keloids, skin cancer, scabies, shingles, vitiligo, and lichen planus.
Get details about bacterial/fungal infections, viral diseases, and skin cancer. Stay informed about facial skin care, body skin tone, sun burn protection, tips for a healthy hair, natural home remedies and natural cure solutions. Skin conditions can be caused by a bacterial skin infection, virus, cancer, fungal infections, sun burns, tanning beds, injured skin and exposure to chemicals like phenol.

🦠 Clinical Laboratory Diagnostics:
Access information on clinical laboratory diagnostics for accurate disease identification. Stay informed about antibiotics drugs, treatment guidelines, and disease prevention.

Sun Safety Tips
Ozone layer depletion decreases our atmosphere's natural protection from the sun's harmful ultraviolet (UV) radiation. 
We have added new tips on:
1. Sun burn protection, 
2. Eye protection from sun burn damage,
3. First aid tips for sun burn injuries and heat illness, 
4. Ultraviolet (UV) radiation,
5. Albinism vs sunlight,


🦠 Skin Infections/Disorders Covered:
    Bacterial Infections/Diseases
    Fungal Infection in Skin
    Viral Diseases/Virus Infections
    Rare Skin Cancer Forms

🚫 This is a comprehensive skin diseases and homeopathy app, serving as your offline skin guide for skin conditions, dermatology A to Z, bacterial identification, fungal infection in skin, and all diseases and treatment drugs offline.
